verses.roman:
śāntipurera loka śuni' prabhura āgamana
dekhite āilā loka prabhura caraṇa

synonyms: śāntipurera loka—all the people of Śāntipura; śuni'-hearing; prabhura āgamana—the arrival of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dekhite āilā—came to see; loka—all the people; prabhura caraṇa—the lotus feet of the Lord.
translation: When the people of Śāntipura heard that Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was staying there, they all immediately came to see His lotus feet.
